last_episode_to_air.name: Pay Back
last_episode_to_air.overview: Grace decides how she will deal with Van.  Honey and Max talk to Hub about his future.

name: Wind at My Back
overview:
A recently widowed mother loses her children to a cold mother-in-law in Ontario during the Great Depression of the 1930s. 

Based loosely on the books "Never Sleep Three in a Bed" and "The Night We Stole the Mounties’ Car" by Max Braithwaite

episodes.name: Four Walls and a Roof (1)
episodes.overview: Financial hardships of the Great Depression hit Honey Bailey and her family, changing the life they had known.

episodes.name: Four Walls and a Roof (2)
episodes.overview: May struggles to handle the boys, especially a defiant Hub, who resolves to get he and his brother back to their mother.  In North Bridge, Honey looks for work.

episodes.name: No Way of Telling
episodes.overview: Honey's brother disappears with her savings.  Meanwhile, the boys search for clues to a bank robbery.

episodes.name: A Family of Independent Means
episodes.overview: Honey is fired and cannot find another job.  Meanwhile, Hub and Fat try to earn money.

episodes.name: My Dog Pal
episodes.overview: Hub and Fat earn money taking care of a dog.

episodes.name: Something From Nothing
episodes.overview: Uncle Bob gets Hub a job on weekends at a local farm and Fat manages to win a small part in a local Chautaugua show.  Meanwhile, when Honey loses everything and is forced inot a charity mission, Aunt Grace intervenes and May Bailey finally agrees that her duaghter-in-law may return.

episodes.name: Moonshine Struck
episodes.overview: While adapting to life with her mother-in-law and coping with her new job, Honey becomes attracted to a charming, but self-centred, local policeman.

episodes.name: Train To Nowhere
episodes.overview: Honey and Grace help Max adapt one of his unsold radio plays for the local drama society, only to see it consume Aunt Toppy's life.

episodes.name: Aunt Grace's Wedding
episodes.overview: Complications and a disapproving May threaten Grace's secret plans to attend an out-of-town wedding with Judd.

episodes.name: No Place Like Home
episodes.overview: Trouble ensues when Uncle Joe makes a surprise visit to New Bedford; Honey and the boys continue their battle to bring baby Violet home.

episodes.name: Chasing Rainbows
episodes.overview: The boys concoct some hair-brained schemes to raise money for Honey's birthday present; May gets into hot water when fundraising proceeds go missing.

episodes.name: Moving Mountains
episodes.overview: Hub has trouble with school and gets involved with a bad crowd.

episodes.name: Back In My Arms Again
episodes.overview: With Honey away at a hairdressing course, Fat learns that Matilda and Hugh plan to leave the country with Violet.

episodes.name: Many Happy Returns
episodes.overview: Max's brother Del arrives for Honey and Max's wedding.

episodes.name: Never Sleep Three In A Bed
episodes.overview: Max faces resistance from Hub and Fat.

episodes.name: The Agony Column
episodes.overview: Grace's on-air advice column becomes popular.

episodes.name: Triple Trouble
episodes.overview: A rebellious tomboy arrives in New Bedford with his grandfather.

episodes.name: Summer Dreams, Summer Nightmares
episodes.overview: Financial straits at the mine cause marital problems for Bob.

episodes.name: The Champ
episodes.overview: Joe arrives in New Bedford to promote a group of wrestlers.

episodes.name: By Gosh Or By Golly
episodes.overview: The workers refuse to return to the mine until it is deemed to be safe.

episodes.name: Careers
episodes.overview: The school holds a Career Day.

episodes.name: Radio Waves
episodes.overview: Grace faces a protest over the cancellation of a radio show.

episodes.name: A Ghost of a Chance
episodes.overview: The kids try to find a ghost at the New Bedford Hotel.

episodes.name: A Meeting of the Clan
episodes.overview: May's cousin Jesse arrives from Nova Scotia.

episodes.name: Of All That Human Hearts Endure
episodes.overview: May's heart pains worsen as she works more and more hours at the mine office.

episodes.name: Smiling Through
episodes.overview: May watches as the mine falls out of her reach, and finally realizes the importance of family.

episodes.name: The Resurrection of May
episodes.overview: May is pained to see New Bedford suffering from the bankrupcy of Silver Dome Mine.  Luke Gerrard returns to New Bedford, provoking May to fight to win back her beloved Silver Dome Mine and put the people of New Bedford back to work.

episodes.name: The Long Weekend
episodes.overview: Hub, Fat and Maisey enter the New Bedford Bed Race; Grace resigns herself to life as a spinster; Max and Honey's 'romantic' weekend at the cabin is more than they expected.

episodes.name: The Forever Leap
episodes.overview: Hub's irresponsible behaviour causes Honey concern.

episodes.name: My Beautiful Mom
episodes.overview: Photographer Tucker Findlay arrives in town for the New Bedford Fall Fair, which Grace is organizing for the first time.  Toppy's daughter Doris comes to visit.

episodes.name: The Fever
episodes.overview: Hub is attracted to Alice.  The Cramps seek a partner for a new bus line venture. Fat and Maisey sees an overturned truck.

episodes.name: The Crystal Skull
episodes.overview: May inherits a mysterious crystal skull that seems to posess extraordinary powers; Maisy faces the truth about her father.

episodes.name: Public Enemies
episodes.overview: A local crime gang, dubbed the Burlesque Bandits, is terrifying the citizens of New Bedford; a mysterious newcomer is curious about Maisey.

episodes.name: New Directions
episodes.overview: May boycotts the Royal Dominion Bank when Mr. Sainsbury refuses to reinstate her line of credit. Del takes a new direction in his life.

episodes.name: The Strap
episodes.overview: Max disagrees with Principal Whitney's disciplinary measures.    Grace is obsessed with the Dionne Quintuplets.   Jim, a new teacher, arrives in New Bedford with his son Pritchard.

episodes.name: Grace of Hollywood
episodes.overview: When film director Nathan Sparks arrives in town, Graces's dreams of stardom suddenly seem in reach.    Ignored by Hub and his friends, Fat decides to enter the local public speaking contest.

episodes.name: Marathon
episodes.overview: The New Bedford radio station hosts a dance marathon.

episodes.name: A Mission For Honey
episodes.overview: Honey nurses a family stricken with influenza.

episodes.name: Life On Mars
episodes.overview: Fat tries to make sense of his world.    Grace plays a role in Ollie and Marjorie's wedding.   Lorna confronts May about the relationship between Hub and Alice.   Bob returns to New Bedford with someone new.

episodes.name: All This And Heaven Too
episodes.overview: Grace Bailey plans a quiet vacation at the family cabin, but bumps into the Fletts and an old family enemy.  Toppy moves into her new home.  The Sutton family visits Honey at the sanitarium (offscreen).

episodes.name: It Don't Mean A Thing
episodes.overview: Toppy pursues her dream of opening an Academy for the Arts.  Hub meets Laura Bridgeman

episodes.name: A Girl In Trouble
episodes.overview: Alice returns to New Bedford.  Grace thinks about buying a car.

episodes.name: A River Rages
episodes.overview: A famous novelist comes to New Bedford.

episodes.name: After Leo
episodes.overview: When Leo McGuinty dies, Maisey finds out that she is to live with May.

episodes.name: Faith Healer
episodes.overview: A faith healer wanders into New Bedford.

episodes.name: Remembrance Day
episodes.overview: Remembrance Day stirs up memories in the townfolk.

episodes.name: The Shadow Boxer
episodes.overview: Del Sutton returns to New Bedford.  Fat becomes obsessed with boxing.

episodes.name: Murmur Most Foul
episodes.overview: Max decides to write a murder mystery to earn some money.

episodes.name: The Wild Blue Yonder
episodes.overview: As his high-school reunion nears, Ollie ponders his dream.

episodes.name: A Family Again
episodes.overview: Honey returns from the sanitarium, and worries about Hub's involvement in Alice's situation.

episodes.name: A Formal Affair
episodes.overview: Laura invites Hub to a ball in Toronto.  Doris comes to New Bedford for a visit.

episodes.name: The Foolish Heart
episodes.overview: Alice is faced a difficult situation.  A visit from Pritchard's grandparents affects Jim and Grace's relationship.

episodes.name: Coming of Age
episodes.overview: A mysterious stranger arrives in New Bedford and expresses interest in Grace.  Fat tries to prove to himself that he is no longer a little kid.  Honey is unable to reopen her salon as Callie refuses to rent her the space.

episodes.name: Oh Happy Day
episodes.overview: The situation with Grace causes stress for May.  Grace and Van's thoughts turn to wedding plans. Honey's salon reopens, but she has trouble attracting business. Hub meets a young girl who needs help.

episodes.name: The Trick Cyclist
episodes.overview: Members of the family struggle with how to take care of May while maintaining their own lives. Maisey worries that she will be shipped off as May is unable to look after her.

episodes.name: New Girls In Town
episodes.overview: May's nurse arrives in New Bedford. A new girl enters Fat and Pritchard's class.

episodes.name: The Spanish Prisoner
episodes.overview: Grace and Van arrive at Lakeview Estate.

episodes.name: Marriage of True Minds
episodes.overview: Max looks forward to his anniversary with Honey.  Someone is sending Rebecca secret admirer letters. Hub receives a letter for athletics.

episodes.name: For God and Country
episodes.overview: The town council seeks a new mayor for New Bedford.

episodes.name: Enter Eddie Jackson
episodes.overview: Hub gets to know a young man who is passing through town.  Fat seeks a chess master to coach him in the game. Someone special pays May a visit.

episodes.name: The Summer Plague
episodes.overview: New Bedford readies itself for the annual Silver Dome fishing tournament and Bank picnic at Bass Lake.

episodes.name: Reconciliation
episodes.overview: A man who worked with Hub at the lumber mill takes up a temporary position at the mine.  The Bell Award is to be presented in New Bedford, and Honey, as the mayor's wife, must make a speech introducing the recipient of the award.  Toppy struggles to find entertainment for the awards ceremony.

episodes.name: Crack In The Mirror
episodes.overview: The Masked Rider comes to town.  Grace receives a strange letter.

episodes.name: Secrets and Lies
episodes.overview: Grace confronts Van about his identity.

episodes.name: Pay Back
episodes.overview: Grace decides how she will deal with Van.  Honey and Max talk to Hub about his future.
